title: Garages, Balcony/Patio, Additional Storage
posting_body: ['LOCATION.', 'COMMUNITY.', 'QUALITY LIVING.', 'Newport Village is located in North Las Vegas.', 'We offer 1 and 2 bedroom apartments for rent.', 'Amenities include gated access, fitness center, resort style pool and spa, playground, patio or balcony, private garages available, ceiling fans, microwaves, washer and dryer included, extra storage available and pets are welcome (up to 25 pounds)!', 'Take a virtual tour of our amazing property and get ready to call us home!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 65', 'OR Text', '65', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 748 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- WiFi Ready Home with Pre-Installed Modem', '- First Month of WiFi FREE for New Cox Customers', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Refrigerator', '- Air Conditioner', '- Range', '- Washer', '- Alarm System', '- Additional Storage', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Dishwasher', '- Wheelchair Accessible', '- Dryer', '- Carpet', '- Balcony/Patio', '- Tub/Shower', 'Community Amenities', '- Online Payments Available', '- Internet Access: High-Speed Available', '- Volleyball Court', '- 2 Swimming Pools', '- Gated Community', '- Fitness Center', '- Storage', '- Clubhouse', '- Garages', '- Playground', '- On-Site Maintenance', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome up to 25 pounds (at mature weight).', 'Please contact our leasing department and one of our expert staff members will review the policies with you.', 'Cats Allowed', 'Dogs Allowed', 'Please note we charge a $300 non-refundable pet fee and $25 per month pet rent.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Newport Village', '1827 West Gowan Road , North Las Vegas, NV, 89032', 'z9lcLQx8I4A']
